name: 1920 Bitwa Warszawska
description:
White Eagles Team's entry for the 1920 Bitwa Warszawska Jam hosted by KPT (Krakowski Park Technologiczny)!

You are płk. Stanisław Wrzaliński and command the XXIX Infantry Brigade of Polish troops. Your goal is to defend against three consecutive waves of Soviet soldiers storming the outskirts of Warsaw. 

Each wave is three minutes long. At your disposal is infantry and machine gun units which you can place around the bunker – the command center of your defensive perimeter.

Click left mouse button to make soldier
Click right mouse button to make machine gun
